name: Quick Arrabbiata Spaghetti
description: A spicy pasta for a quick dinner or side dish. Make it a meal by adding shrimp.

ingredients.name: Marinara Sauce Mix or Bruschetta Seasoning
Chipotle Aioli Mix or Chili Seasoning

preparation: In Multipurpose Pot, cook pasta according to package directions.
Heat frying pan over medium-high heat. Add olive oil, Marinara  Sauce Mix and anchovy fillets, if desired. Heat until aromatic.
Remove from heat, add parsley, crushed chilies and drained cooked pasta. Toss well and season with Salt and Pepper.
tips: Serve with freshly grated Parmesan cheese and prawns.

products.name: Marinara Sauce Mix
summary: A simple, kid-friendly sauce that speaks volumes, Marinara is packed with the bright flavour of garlic, oregano, and basil. Pair it with your fave pasta and use it as a base layer for delicious homemade pizza.

products.name: Bruschetta Seasoning
summary: An aromatic blend of basil, garlic and parsley.

products.name: Chipotle Aioli Mix
summary: Medium-spicy Southwestern flavour with noteworthy chipotle chili and smoked paprika. A crowd-pleasing condiment for your burgers, fries, fish tacos, burritos and anything else that needs a little extra kick.

products.name: Chili Seasoning (1001136)
summary: Make classic, restaurant-quality chili at home with better-for-you ingredients.
